6099 - Functions Related to Depository Banking, Not Elsewhere Classified Summary > iSIGNTHIS LTD (ISX, formerly Otis Energy Limited) is financial services company and developer of RegTech software solutions, headquartered in Melbourne, Australia, with operations centres in Nicosia, Cyprus, Vilnius, Lithuania and London, UK, with sales offices in Sydney, Australia, Amsterdam, the Netherlands, Tel-Aviv, Israel and Valetta, Malta.
